Taylor Street,
                                                                                  Chicago,
                                                              IL
                                        60612    Cost  FREE    Calendar  Download iCal File      Every August, prior to the start of the Fall Semester, the Graduate College sponsors a mandatory Campus-Wide New Teaching Assistant (TA) Orientation.  All graduate students who will be TAs at UIC for the first time during the upcoming Fall and/or Spring Semester are required to attend.  The purpose of the orientation is to provide new TAs with information on the relevant policies, procedures, and campus resources that will help them successfully fulfill their TA duties.    General Check-In: 12:00 – 1:00 pm  Orientation: 1:00 – 4:00 pm  Tentative Orientation Agenda      Register for the Campus-Wide New TA Orientation       Contact  International Teaching Assistant Program  (312) 413-2235  itap@uic.edu     Date posted  Jun 12, 2019    Date updated  Jul 10, 2019
